name: Mobinil (now Orange Egypt)
description: Mobinil, now known as Orange Egypt, is a leading mobile network operator in Egypt. We provided various services to support their operational resilience.

name: National Commercial Bank / AlAhli Bank
description: National Commercial Bank (NCB), now Saudi National Bank (SNB) after merging with Samba Financial Group, is a prominent financial institution in Saudi Arabia. We assisted them in enhancing their continuity and risk management frameworks.

name: NCB Capital
description: NCB Capital, the investment banking arm of NCB, is a key player in the Saudi capital markets. Our services helped them optimize their business continuity and information security protocols.

name: Sample Client A
description: We collaborated with Sample Client A, a multinational corporation in the technology sector, to implement robust disaster recovery solutions.

name: Sample Client B
description: Providing specialized risk assessment and mitigation strategies for Sample Client B, a leader in the renewable energy industry.
